Articles.Content:
Am I right in thinking that 1.2.1 hasn't really changed or broken much form 1.2

I ask because I'm not seeing the usually post-update flurry of mod updates or many questions along the lines of "working in 1.2.1?" in the threads for many mods.

Am I to assume this is because most of them just work without issue?
Yeah pretty much.  Only a select few mods needed to be updated.  Now most mods just need the versioning to be updated so AVC will stop reporting mods being outdated.
